bibl.title: Peasants and "Modern" Leasing Strategies in Ancient Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Discusses the continuity in the socio-economic history of Egypt. Focuses on issues of land tenure. Data from the Graeco-Roman period are used. - Pp. 386-390: Bibliography.
bibl.seg: EYRE Christopher J., Peasants and "Modern" Leasing Strategies in Ancient Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
Discusses the continuity in the socio-economic history of Egypt. Focuses on issues of land tenure. Data from the Graeco-Roman period are used. - Pp. 386-390: Bibliography.
